faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.description: Everything you need to know about QuickBG. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact us and we'll get back to you ASAP!
faq.stillHaveQuestionsDesc: We're here to help! Reach out to our friendly support team and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

howDoesItWork.a: QuickBG uses advanced AI technology (ISNet) to automatically detect and remove backgrounds from your images. Simply upload your image, and our AI processes it with professional quality. You'll get a high-quality PNG with smooth edges and a transparent background, ready to download.

needSignup.q: Do I need to sign up to use QuickBG?
needSignup.a: No! You can try QuickBG 5 times completely free without creating an account. After your free tries, create a free account to get unlimited background removal forever - no credit card required.

isFree.a: Yes! QuickBG is 100% free. You get 5 tries without signup, then unlimited background removal after creating a free account. There are no hidden fees, no premium tiers, and no credit card required.

freeTierLimits.q: What are the free tier limits?
freeTierLimits.a: Anonymous users: 5 free tries without signup. Registered users: Unlimited background removal - no limits, forever free. Just create a free account after your 5 tries.

imageFormats.q: What image formats do you support?
imageFormats.a: We support all common image formats including JPG, JPEG, PNG, WEBP, and more. Your processed image is always exported as a high-quality PNG with transparency.

maxImageSize.a: You can upload images up to 10MB and 4096x4096 pixels. Our AI automatically optimizes the processing while maintaining quality.

processingSpeed.a: Most images are processed in 2-5 seconds. We've optimized our AI model for speed without compromising quality.

storeImages.a: Absolutely not! We have a strict zero-storage policy. Your images are processed in memory and immediately deleted after you download them. We never save, store, or keep any of your images.

dataSafe.a: Yes! We use secure HTTPS connections for all uploads. Your images are processed on our servers and deleted immediately. We don't track or store any image data.

whoCanSee.a: Only you! Your images are never accessible to anyone else. They're processed privately and exist only during the brief processing period.

aiTechnology.a: We use the ISNet AI model (isnet-general-use), which delivers professional-grade results with smooth edges and precise detail handling. It's the same quality standard used by premium background removal services.

firstUploadSlow.q: Why is my first upload slower?
firstUploadSlow.a: The AI model is pre-warmed when our server starts, so your first upload should be just as fast! If you notice any slowness, it's likely due to network conditions.

commercialUse.q: Can I use QuickBG for commercial projects?
commercialUse.a: Yes! You can use QuickBG for personal and commercial projects. The processed images are yours to use however you like.

haveAPI.a: Not yet, but it's on our roadmap! We're focused on perfecting the web experience first. Sign up to get notified when our API launches.

uploadFailed.a: Common reasons: Image exceeds 10MB, unsupported format, or network issues. Make sure your image is under 10MB and in a standard format (JPG, PNG, WEBP).

backgroundNotRemoved.q: The background wasn't removed correctly. Why?
backgroundNotRemoved.a: AI isn't perfect! Complex backgrounds, low-contrast images, or transparent subjects can be challenging. Try images with clear subject-background separation for best results.

usedAllTries.q: I've used all my free tries. Now what?
usedAllTries.a: Create a free account to get unlimited background removal! It takes just 30 seconds and doesn't require a credit card.

loggedInIssues.q: I'm logged in but having issues uploading.
loggedInIssues.a: If you're logged in, you should have unlimited access. Try signing out and signing back in. If the issue persists, clear your browser cache and cookies, then try again.

createAccount.q: How do I create an account?
createAccount.a: Click 'Sign Up' in the top right corner, enter your name, email, and password. That's it! No credit card needed.

upgradeAccount.a: Currently, we offer unlimited background removal for free! All registered users get unlimited access with no daily limits. Enterprise options may be available in the future for additional features.

deleteAccount.q: How do I delete my account?
deleteAccount.a: Contact us at contact@quickbg.app and we'll delete your account within 24 hours. Remember, we don't store any of your images anyway!

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have a question, feedback, or need help? We're here for you! Drop us a message and we'll respond within 24 hours.
contact.sendMessageDesc: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us more about your question or feedback...
contact.messageSent: Message sent! We'll get back to you within 24 hours.
contact.basedInDesc: Serving users worldwide with cloud-based infrastructure
contact.lookingForAnswersDesc: Check out our FAQ page for instant answers to common questions about QuickBG, pricing, and more.

about.title: Making Background Removal
about.description: We believe everyone should have access to professional-quality image editing tools. That's why we built QuickBG - a fast, private, and completely free background removal service.
about.story1: QuickBG was born from a simple frustration: why should removing an image background be so complicated and expensive? We saw countless tools that either charged hefty fees, required subscriptions, or compromised on quality.
about.story2: We decided to build something different. Using cutting-edge AI technology, we created a tool that delivers professional results in seconds - without storing your images or charging you a dime for basic use.
about.story3: Today, QuickBG helps thousands of users every day - from small business owners creating product photos, to designers working on quick mockups, to anyone who needs a transparent background without the hassle.
about.valuesDesc: Our core values guide everything we do
about.privacyFirstDesc: We never store your images. Upload, process, download - then it's gone forever. Your photos stay yours.
about.speedQualityDesc: We optimize every millisecond. Get professional-quality results in 2-5 seconds, not minutes.
about.freeForeverDesc: Everyone deserves access to great tools. Try 5 times without signup, then get unlimited background removal free forever.
about.missionDesc: To democratize professional image editing by providing lightning-fast, privacy-focused, and completely free background removal tools to everyone, everywhere.
about.impactDesc: Real metrics that matter to you
about.readyDesc: Join thousands of users who trust QuickBG for fast, private, and free background removal. Start with 5 free tries - no signup required!

privacy.title: Your Privacy
privacy.introDesc: At QuickBG, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our background removal service.
privacy.tldrDesc: We don't store your images. Ever. Your photos are processed in memory and immediately deleted. No exceptions.
privacy.accountInfoDesc: If you create an account, we collect:
privacy.usageStatsDesc: We track basic usage statistics for logged-in users:
privacy.zeroStorageDesc: We do NOT store, save, or keep any images you upload. Images are processed in memory and deleted immediately after you download them. We have no database, no backups, no copies.
privacy.use1: To provide and maintain our service
privacy.use2: To provide usage statistics (logged-in users have unlimited access)
privacy.use4: To improve our service and user experience
privacy.use5: To prevent abuse and enforce our Terms of Service
privacy.flowDesc: When you upload an image, here's exactly what happens:
privacy.flow1: Your image is uploaded via secure HTTPS connection
privacy.flow2: Our AI processes it in memory (2-5 seconds)
privacy.flow3: The processed image is sent back to you
privacy.flow4: Both original and processed images are immediately deleted from our servers
privacy.flow5: No traces remain - we keep zero copies
privacy.security1: HTTPS encryption for all data transmission
privacy.security5: No image storage = no risk of image data breaches
privacy.anonymousTrackingDesc: IP-based tracking for free tier limits (5 tries)
privacy.noThirdPartyDesc: We don't use Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, or similar
privacy.thirdPartyDesc: We use the following third-party services:
privacy.postgresqlDesc: To store account information only (not images)
privacy.notUsed: We do NOT use: Amazon S3, Google Cloud Storage, or any file storage service.
privacy.right3: Delete your account at any time
privacy.childrenDesc: QuickBG is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect information from children. If you're a parent and believe your child has used our service, please contact us.
privacy.changesDesc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We'll notify you of any significant changes by email (if you have an account) or by posting a notice on our website.
privacy.contactDesc: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms.title: Terms of
terms.agreementDesc: By accessing or using QuickBG ("Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you don't agree to these terms, please don't use our Service.
terms.serviceDesc: QuickBG provides an AI-powered background removal service. The Service includes:
terms.service2: 5 free tries without creating an account
terms.service3: Unlimited background removal for registered users (free forever)
terms.accountCreationDesc: To use QuickBG beyond 5 free tries, you must create an account. When creating an account:
terms.accountReq2: You must be at least 13 years old
terms.accountReq3: You're responsible for maintaining account security
terms.accountReq4: One person or entity may maintain only one free account
terms.accountRespDesc: You are responsible for all activity under your account. If you believe your account has been compromised, notify us immediately at contact@quickbg.app.
terms.limit1: Anonymous Users: 5 free tries without signup
terms.limit2: Registered Users: Unlimited background removal - no daily limits
terms.limit3: After using your 5 free tries, create a free account for unlimited access
terms.limit4: Attempting to circumvent limits may result in account suspension
terms.prohibited1: Upload illegal, offensive, or inappropriate content
terms.prohibited2: Use the Service for any unlawful purpose
terms.prohibited3: Attempt to hack, disrupt, or compromise the Service
terms.prohibited4: Create multiple accounts to circumvent usage limits
terms.prohibited5: Upload images containing personal information of others without consent
terms.prohibited6: Use automated bots or scripts to abuse the Service
terms.prohibited7: Resell or commercially distribute our Service without permission
terms.prohibited8: Upload malware, viruses, or malicious code
terms.yourContentDesc: You retain full ownership of all images you upload. We claim no ownership rights to your content.
terms.ourContentDesc: The QuickBG Service, including its design, features, and AI technology, is owned by us and protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
terms.zeroStorageGuaranteeDesc: We do not store, save, or keep any images you upload. Images are processed in memory and immediately deleted.
terms.privacyPolicyLink: For full details on how we handle your data, please read our Privacy Policy.
terms.availabilityDesc: We strive to keep QuickBG available 24/7, but we don't guarantee:
terms.availability3: That the Service will meet your specific requirements
terms.availability4: That defects will be corrected immediately
terms.availabilityNote: We may suspend or terminate the Service for maintenance, updates, or other reasons.
terms.disclaimerDesc: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND. We disclaim all warranties, express or implied, including warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.
terms.liabilityDesc: To the maximum extent permitted by law, QuickBG shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits or revenues.
terms.terminationDesc: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the Service:
terms.termination3: For any reason, with or without notice
terms.terminationNote: You may delete your account at any time from your account settings.
terms.changesDesc: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. If we make material changes, we'll notify you by email (if you have an account) or by posting a notice on our website. Continued use of the Service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
terms.governingLawDesc: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws, without regard to conflict of law provisions.
terms.contactDesc: If you have questions about these Terms, please contact us:
terms.acknowledgment: By using QuickBG, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

cookies.title: Cookie
cookies.description: Control how QuickBG uses cookies and similar technologies
cookies.essentialDesc: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you, such as logging in or filling in forms.
cookies.analyticsDesc: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve our service.
cookies.analyticsNote: Note: QuickBG currently does not use analytics cookies
cookies.marketingDesc: These cookies track your online activity to help advertisers deliver more relevant advertising or to limit how many times you see an ad.
cookies.marketingNote: Note: QuickBG does not use marketing or advertising cookies
cookies.preferencesExpired: Your cookie preferences have expired. Please review and save again.
cookies.transparencyDesc: Transparency is important to us. Here's what we really use:
cookies.sessionCookieDesc: To keep you logged in while you use QuickBG. This expires when you close your browser. Essential for account functionality.
cookies.anonymousTrackingDesc: IP-based tracking to enforce the 5 free tries limit for anonymous users. No personal data is stored. Resets automatically after 24 hours.
cookies.noThirdPartyDesc: We don't use Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, or any third-party tracking services. Your privacy is our priority.
